articles.title: Video: Jimmy Kimmel Chokes Up During TV Show Monologue About Trump Win - NDTV
articles.description: American comic and talk show host Jimmy Kimmel, who usually shows his audience the funny side of things, could not find his smile on the day Donald Trump was elected President of the US for a second time.
articles.content: Los Angeles, California: American comic and talk show host Jimmy Kimmel, who usually shows his audience the funny side of things, could not find his smile on the day Donald Trump was elected Presiden… [+3145 chars]

articles.title: Susie Wiles: Who is Trump’s new chief of staff? - BBC.com
articles.description: The 67-year-old - whose father was an American football star - will be the first woman in the job.
articles.content:
US President-elect Donald Trump has announced his campaign manager, Susan Summerall Wiles, will serve as his White House chief of staff when he takes over the presidency next year.
